info.title: Welcome to Grocery List!
info.subtitle: Your smart assistant for all your groceries.
info.featuresSubtitle: Discover everything you can do with our app
info.feature1Text: Create an unlimited number of grocery lists for any occasion. Add infinite products and keep everything organized in one place.
info.feature2Text: Easily share your lists with others. Collaborate in real-time and see instantly which groceries are already in the basket. Perfect for households!
info.feature3Text: Add your loyalty cards, receipts, or other important cards to the app. This way, you have everything at hand and never miss out again.
info.feature4Text: The app learns from your habits and provides smart suggestions for products you frequently buy. You'll never forget anything again.
info.feature5Text: All your lists, products, and cards are securely stored on your personal account. Available anytime, anywhere.
info.screensIntro: Here's how it looks while managing lists, adding products and checking items off.
info.screenListPageText: Manage all your lists, mark favorites and share with others.
info.screenItemsOpenText: See at a glance what still needs to be bought.
